alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 7:04AM CST until December 30 at 7:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HINDS AND NORTHERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 704 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Utica to near Gallman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Gallman around 710 AM CST. Crystal Springs around 715 AM CST. Raymond and Terry around 735 AM CST. Bolton around 740 AM CST. Jackson around 745 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Learned. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
